### About me
***
<p style="font-size:16px; LINE-HEIGHT:26px">
I am a Ph.D. student in the [DELTA](https://education.illinois.edu/ci/programs-degrees/delta){target="_blank"} program at [the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign](https://illinois.edu/){target="_blank"}. Previously, I earned my masterâ€™s degree in educational measurement from [Beijing Normal University](https://english.bnu.edu.cn/){target="_blank"}. My research interests are how digital learning environments can support children in becoming self-regulated learners. I am also interested in introductory computer science (CS1) education. My dissertation is about how sequential analysis methods, e.g., sequential pattern mining, lag-sequential analysis, and process mining, can help us understand students' learning behavior.
